element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm inverts a mask for a raster layer. Cells with no-data values will have a value of 1, while all the remaining cells will have a no-data value

image.description: Input layer with mask to be inverted (No-data values are shown in black)
New layer with inverted mask (No-data values are shown in black)

element.name: INPUT
element.text: The layer which contains the mask to be inverted
